Name: Team Size
Description: Number of members in the development team.

Name: Number of Sprints
Description: Total number of sprints planned for the project.

Name: Sprint Duration
Description: Length of each sprint in days.

Name: Features per Sprint
Description: Number of features assigned to each sprint.

Name: Story Points per Sprint
Description: Total story points allocated to each sprint backlog.

Name: Employee Assignment
Description: Binary variable indicating if an employee is assigned to the project.

Name: Budget per Sprint
Description: Amount of budget allocated to each sprint.

Name: Tasks per Employee
Description: Number of tasks assigned to each employee per sprint.

Name: Release Version
Description: Version number for the release plan.

Name: Feature Inclusion
Description: Binary variable indicating if a feature is included in the release.
